snippet: Mr. Matthiessen’s nonfiction explored the remote endangered wilds of the world, and his fiction often placed his protagonists in the heart of them.
abstract: Peter Matthiessen, roving author and naturalist whose impassioned nonfiction explored remote endangered wilds around world and whose prizewinning fiction often placed his mysterious protagonists in them, dies at age 86; Matthiessen, whose final novel In Paradise is forthcoming, was one of last survivors of generation of American writers who came of age after World War II.

byline.contributor: William McDonald and Ashley Southall contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Matthiessen’s nonfiction explored the remote endangered wilds of the world, and his fiction often placed his protagonists in the heart of them.

headline.main: Peter Matthiessen, Lyrical Writer and Naturalist, Is Dead at 86
headline.print_headline: Peter Matthiessen, Lyrical, Adventurous Writer and Naturalist, Dies at 86
